required.name: Belarus
required.note:
Visas are issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport
if the support documents were submitted not later than 3 business days before expected date of arrival. Visa-free agreement signed, not yet ratified.

required.name: China
required.note: 72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Guangzhou, Guilin, Shanghai, Shenyang and Xi'an.

required.name: Kazakhstan
required.note: Visa-free agreement signed, not yet ratified.

required.name: Moldova
required.note: Visa-free agreement signed, not yet ratified.

required.name: Mozambique
required.note: Visa on arrival is no longer available to citizens of countries that host an embassy of Mozambique.

required.name: Pakistan
required.note: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply.

required.name: Vietnam
required.note:
Prearranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Phu Quoc or Da Nang airports.
Phú Quốc without a visa for up to 30 days.

not-required.name: Austria
not-required.note: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry to the Schengen area

not-required.name: Belgium
not-required.note: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry to the Schengen area

not-required.name: Czech Republic
not-required.note: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry to the Schengen area

not-required.name: Denmark
not-required.note: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry to the Schengen area

not-required.name: Dominican Republic
not-required.note: 90 days (10 USD Tourist Card must be purchased upon arrival)

not-required.name: Estonia
not-required.note: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry to the Schengen area

not-required.name: Finland
not-required.note: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry to the Schengen area

not-required.name: France
not-required.note: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry to the Schengen area (in Regions of France). Visa required for French Guiana.

not-required.note: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry to the Schengen area

not-required.note: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry to the Schengen area (European Netherlands)

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: Kenya
evisa.note: 3 months; also visa on arrival until 1 September 2015

evisa.name: Myanmar
evisa.note: 28 days. eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports.

on-arrival.name: Bahrain
on-arrival.note: 14 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Kyrgyzstan
on-arrival.note: 1 month. Available at Manas International Airport.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: Brazilian immigrants, or Brazilian businessmen are granted a multiple entry visa on arrival valid for 90 days for tourism purposes only and is renewable once following the approval of the General Directorate of General Security. This visa however shall not exceed 90 days.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: Tajikistan
on-arrival.note: 45 days at Dushanbe International Airport. Visa also available online. E-visa holders can enter through all border points.

on-arrival.name: Zambia
on-arrival.note: 90 days; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe.

on-arrival.name: Zimbabwe
on-arrival.note: 3 months for tourism purposes only; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia.
